Action.author: nemoto
Action.body: ~latitiah Is anybody fixing these tasks? Or, does anybody have a plan to do? If no, can I assign me one of them?

Action.author: nemoto
Action.body: ~latitiah Thanks. I took a look at README, *.feature and steps/*. It seems that some functions in endorser_impl.py (e.g., deploy_impl) are not implemented yet. I might as well implement these placeholder functions. If I understand incorrectly, please let me know.

Action.author: latitiah
Action.body: ~nemoto Actually there are a number of CRs that have this work implemented (some were just merged). There is 1 more that is waiting to be merged and it should contain all the necessary steps needed in order to completed these tests. I am working on the orderer implementation steps next.

Action.author: nemoto
Action.body: ~latitiah Great! Now, I understood the latest status.

Action.author: nemoto
Action.body: ~latitiah Thanks. I'm watching the CR and writing patches based on it. So, I will submit them soon once it's merged.

Action.author: nemoto
Action.body: ~latitiah I submitted CRs for FAB-3865 and FAB-3866. Any feedbacks would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
